: : Wolfenstein : :

Wolf looked over the parts.

Wolf: I can help.

Wolf helps to assemble Waspinator before he finally gets in the CR and submerges in the tank.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Starstorm:

"thanks "said the femem with a smile "can you help me to put every 
piece in its place???? or are you very busy?"

wrote:
> : : Wolfenstein : :
> 
> Wolf: Sure.
> 
> Before Wolf got into the CR tank he helped Starstorm with 
Waspinator.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
